name: Scorching Samba
description:
3D Shooter Project for the Michigan State University Specialization in Game Design and Development. 

Modifications done over the base project:

  • Design of three complete, new levels.
  • Creation of 4 new music tracks (Main Menu, Level1, Level2, Boss Level)
  • Small UI changes (font: Daily Mix 3 by Chequered Ink)

Created by Vladimir "Kyoomei" Romero

All music by Vladimir "Kyoomei" Romero

Base code and assets provided by Michigan State University
